SlashID::authenticating.password.label: Password
SlashID::authenticating.initial.password: If you are using a password for the first time, you will receive an email to verify your email address.
If you are using a password for the first time, you will receive a message to verify your phone number.
SlashID::authenticating.setPassword.mess: Define a secure password to sign up.
SlashID::authenticating.verifyPassword.m: Type your password to sign in.
We have sent an email to {{EMAIL_ADDRESS}} with instructions for resetting your password. This email can take a few minutes to arrive, make sure to check your spam.
We have sent a message to {{PHONE_NUMBER}} with instructions for resetting your password. This message can take a few minutes to arrive, make sure to check your spam.

SlashID::org.switcher.label: Organization
SlashID::gdpr.dialog.title: We value your privacy
SlashID::gdpr.dialog.subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience. Learn more in our Cookie policy.
SlashID::gdpr.consent.necessary.title: Necessary cookies
SlashID::gdpr.consent.necessary.descript: Cookies that are essential to provide the service you have requested or which are required to comply with legal requirements, like data protection laws.
SlashID::gdpr.consent.analytics.title: Analytics
SlashID::gdpr.consent.analytics.descript: Cookies that are used for analytics or performance measurement purposes, like counting the number of unique visitors to our site, how long you stay on the site, and what parts of our site you visit.
SlashID::gdpr.consent.marketing.title: Marketing
SlashID::gdpr.consent.marketing.descript: Cookies that are used to display advertising personalised to you (whether on or off our site) based on your browsing and profile.
SlashID::gdpr.consent.retargeting.title: Retargeting
SlashID::gdpr.consent.retargeting.descri: Cookies that are used to display advertising personalised to you (whether on or off our site) based on your browsing and profile.
SlashID::gdpr.consent.tracking.title: Tracking
SlashID::gdpr.consent.tracking.descripti: Cookies that track your online behaviour, such as clicks, preferences, device specifications, location, and search history. This data helps in targeted advertising and gathering website analytics.
SlashID::gdpr.dialog.error.title: Oops!
SlashID::gdpr.dialog.error.subtitle: Looks like something went wrong...
